title: Home Tab - Team Snapshot - Team in the Series
custom_preconds:
Tester has their test device set up in Spanish Language.
Tester has configured their app to be connected to the QA environment.
There is a Post Season Game that is about to be strung.
Tester is logged in with a test userid.
Tester has favorite team set to one of the teams about to play in the Post Season Game.
custom_steps:
1.  While the game is each of these 3 states:  (Preview, In Progress, Final) - check that this state is indicated in Spanish.
2.  Check that the day of the week for the selected game is indicated in Spanish
2.  Check that the links (Gameday, Tickets, Story are in Spanish.
3.  Check that the tab names (Home, Scores, Watch, Standings, News) are in Spanish.
4.  Scroll down and check that articles, My Highlights, My Players, My News, Popular, Standings, and other articles are in Spanish.
5.  Check that additional links such as Full Standings, See More, and Edit are in Spanish.
custom_expected: Team Names, Player Names, and Calendar information will not be in Spanish.  Advertisements may or may not be in Spanish.

title: Provider Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is testing postseason feeds
AND the TV Network schedules are released
custom_steps: WHEN the user tests playback on all TV Provider streams
custom_expected:
THEN the user can confirm successful playback from:
1. ESPN
2. ABC
3. FOX
4. TBS
5. ESPN2

title: Executive Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is testing postseason feeds
AND the user is logged into their executive account
AND the executive account has full MLB.tv access
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches a live postseason game
AND the game is National or International
custom_expected:
THEN the executive credentials do not have blackouts
AND the executive credentials do not have MVPD flows
AND the executive credentials do not have paywalls

title: International MLBALL Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in as an INT user 
AND the INT account has an MLBALL subscription
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches an INT postseason feed
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive successful playback

title: International Single-Team  Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into an INT-ST Account
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches an international feed
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive successful playback

title: Audio-Only Playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into an account with MLB Audio credentials
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the audio EPG button (headphones)
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to listen to audio streams or audio-only

title: Provider Archive Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is testing postseason feeds
AND the user has linked their account to a TV Provider
custom_steps: WHEN a game has gone final and archived
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to receive instant playback

title: Non-MVPD Archive Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is testing postseason feeds
AND the user does not have a TV provider linked to their account
custom_steps:
WHEN the postseason stream goes final
AND 90 minutes has passed
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to receive archive playback without having to have an MVPD sign-in linked

title: International Feeds and International Users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in as an INT user
AND the INT account has an MLBALL subscription
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches an International feed
custom_expected: THEN the user will be able to receive playback

title: Feeds for Canadian Users
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into an account in Canada
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to launch a postseason stream
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a blackout message

*Subject to change in future postseasons

title: Free User Access (Not Entitled)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged into an account
AND the user is not logged into a TV Provider
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to launch a game
custom_expected: THEN the user will get a non-entitled error message

title: Single Team Users and Audio Streams
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is signed into a Single-Team account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the Audio EPG Menu
AND the user taps on an audio stream
custom_expected: THEN the user will be able to listen to game audio

title: MLB Audio Only Subscriptions
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user's account has audio-only entitlements
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to launch a game
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a non-entitled message
OR the user will be dlinked into the Audio EPG menu

title: Archive MVPD Auth Removal After 90 Minutes
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is not linked to an MVPD TV Provider
custom_steps:
WHEN the live game enters archived state
AND the archive has been available for 90+ minutes
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive playback immediately
AND the user will not need to sign into TV Provider

title: Archive Canadian Users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is located in Canada
AND a game has entered a completed archive state
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the archive after 90 minutes
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive playback
AND the Canadian user will no longer be blacked out

title: INT Feed Blackouts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is located in the United States
AND the user has an MLBAll subscription
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to launch the INT feed
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a blackout message
AND the user will only be able to launch US feed

title: Single Team Users and MVPD
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is signed into a Single-Team account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to launch a US feed
AND the user signs into their cable provider
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to receive US feed playback

title: Anon MLBALL Users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has purchased an MLB.tv subscription through Apple Store

AND the user does not link the purchase to an MLB account
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a US Feed in the feed picker
custom_expected: THEN the user must sign into a cable TV provider in order to receive playback of the US feed

title: Correct Logo In Auth Flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has selected a US feed
AND the app prompts the user to link a tv provider
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters the MVPD flow
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the correct postseason logo

title: Successful Launch After MVPD Auth
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has selected a US feed
AND the app prompts the user to link a tv provider
custom_steps:
WHEN the user signs into their cable provider
AND then navigated back to the MLB app launch point
custom_expected: THEN the feed will begin playback

title: MLBALL Users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into an account
AND the user has an MLBALL entitlement
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the US feed option
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive a prompt for the MVPD flow

title: MVPD Pill
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is viewing the hero image on Watch tab

AND the user is not entitled to an account with a TV Provider connected
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the various pills that may be displayed on the hero image
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the MVPD pill indicating that the user will have to sign into their cable provider

title: Games With Auth
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is attempting to launch a game with an MVPD auth requirement
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the hero image text
custom_expected: THEN you may verify the Auth text displayed: “Authentication to a participating pay TV provider is required to view select Postseason games in the U.S.. To authenticate, visit mlb.tv/postseason”

title: Games With Auth (Spanish)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is attempting to launch a game with MVPD auth requirements
custom_steps: WHEN verifying the hero auth copy
custom_expected:
THEN you may verify the hero messaging in Spanish: 

"Games With Auth: “Autenticación de un proveedor de televisión por pago se requiere para ver juegos selectos de Postemporada en EE.UU. Para autenticar, visita mlb.tv/postseason"

title: Games Without Auth For Canadian Users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch a game without MVPD requirements

AND the user is located in Canada
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the hero copy
custom_expected:
THEN user may verify messaging for Games w/out auth: 

“Live game video of this Postseason game is not available in Canada. Live audio is available for every Postseason game.”

title: Games Without Auth For Candian Users (Spanish)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch a game without MVPD requirements

AND the user is located in Canada
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the hero message for the game
custom_expected:
THEN user may verify spanish hero messaging of: 

"El video del juego en vivo de este juego de postemporada no está disponible en Canadá. El audio en vivo está disponible para cada juego de postemporada."

title: Confirm FLive In Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch content from the Watch Now hero

AND the hero features Free Live content (World Series Parade)
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the FLive content
custom_expected: THEN successful playback will begin

title: Confirm SLive In Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch content from the Watch Now hero

AND the hero features Subscription Live content (Bettor's Eye)
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the SLive content
custom_expected: THEN successful playback of SLive stream is confirmed

title: Confirm VOD In Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch content from the Watch Now hero

AND the hero features VOD content (Fastcast)
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches VOD content from hero
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive successful playback

title: Confirm SVOD in Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch content from the Watch Now hero

AND the hero features SVOD content (MLB Featured Section's Inside Stitch)
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches SVOD content from hero
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive successful playback

title: Watch Live Button For SLive/FLive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is attempting to launch content from the Watch Now hero

AND the hero features FLive or SLive content
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the hero image and copy
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a Watch Live button displayed

title: Games Carousel On Home/Watch Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is only one game scheduled for the current day

AND the game is not in a live state yet
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Games carousel area under the hero
custom_expected:
THEN the game that is not live yet will be featured under Games

AND FLive, SLive, VOD, or SVOD content will be in the hero

title: Games Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Games page on a date where there is only one game featured
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game page in the Watch segment
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the featured game tile displayed

title: No Games Carousel On Home/Watch Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Home/Watch page on a date where there are no games being displayed
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls up and down through the page
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any games carousel available for the user, including a header
